title: [Large-scale] Critical Mathematical Thinking and Language Reasoning Development Module Using Symmedian Geometry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geometry concepts (triangles, angles, length) and algebraic problem-solving skills, foundational language expression abilities for explaining mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Ensuring spatiotemporal flexibility through digital devices, combining weekly intensive workshops with individual assignments. Focus on improving learners' expressive and reading comprehension skills through activities that verbalize mathematical concepts.

learning_goals: Analyze the geometric properties of symmedians in triangles using linguistic and mathematical terminology, improving spatial reasoning and argumentation skills.
Design a protocol for systematically solving mathematical problems using a mixed-methods approach (experiment + case study) and express it in structured text.
Critically evaluate errors in geometric proofs using critical thinking and propose alternative solutions through a logical language system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
